page.title: 09INDUSTRY (other)
page.content:
There are other industries which serve the mining industry.Qualter Hall, an engineering company celebrating its 125th. anniversary in 1985, makes equipment such as mine shaft cages. As well as serving the Barnsley area, Qualter Hall has made equipment for
all areas of the British coalfield. Wheatley Engineering Company is a smaller company which makes safety products for the mining industry.
Apart from the mining industry, people are employed in making glass bottles at Redfern's glass factory, clothing for the Marks and Spencer chain of stores at S. R. Gent's and a variety of smaller industries.
